statements: SELECT * FROM ClaimsAdjusters
SELECT name, email FROM ClaimsAdjusters
SELECT phone_number, hire_date FROM ClaimsAdjusters
SELECT * FROM ClaimsAdjusters WHERE claim_adjuster_id = 1
SELECT name, email FROM ClaimsAdjusters WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ClaimsAdjusters WHERE claim_adjuster_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM ClaimsAdjusters WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT claim_adjuster_id, name, hire_date FROM ClaimsAdjusters ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClaimsAdjusters WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT name, hire_date FROM ClaimsAdjusters WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' AND hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PolicyInformation;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_id FROM PolicyInformation;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_type FROM PolicyInformation ORDER BY policy_type DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, coverage_amount FROM PolicyInformation WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM ClaimsProcessing WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01' AND claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM PolicyInformation WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT policy_holder, coverage_amount FROM PolicyInformation WHERE coverage_amount > 100000 ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;

SELECT policy_holder, COUNT(*) AS claim_count FROM PolicyInformation JOIN ClaimsProcessing ON PolicyInformation.policy_id = ClaimsProcessing.policy_id GROUP BY policy_holder HAVING claim_count > 5 ORDER BY claim_count DESC;
SELECT p.policy_holder, c.claimant_name FROM PolicyInformation p JOIN ClaimsProcessing c ON p.policy_id = c.policy_id WHERE c.claim_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY p.policy_holder, c.claimant_name;

SELECT p.policy_holder, c.claimant_name, c.claim_date FROM PolicyInformation p JOIN ClaimsProcessing c ON p.policy_id = c.policy_id WHERE c.claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY c.claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policy;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_type FROM Policy;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, policy_start_date FROM Policy;
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_amount FROM Claims;
SELECT * FROM Policy;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date FROM Policy WHERE policy_type='Car';
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Policy WHERE policy_end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claimant_name, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_phone, adjuster_email, adjuster_specialty FROM Adjusters;
SELECT * FROM PolicyInformation;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM PolicyInformation;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount, claim_status FROM Claims;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_email FROM ClaimsAdjuster;
SELECT claim_id, adjuster_id, claim_date, settlement_amount FROM ClaimHistory;
SELECT * FROM PolicyInformation;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM PolicyInformation WHERE policy_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT adjuster_id, adjuster_name, adjuster_email, adjuster_phone FROM ClaimsAdjuster WHERE adjuster_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT ch.history_id, c.claim_id, ca.adjuster_name, ch.claim_date, ch.settlement_amount FROM ClaimHistory ch JOIN Claims c ON ch.claim_id = c.claim_id JOIN ClaimsAdjuster ca ON ch.adjuster_id = ca.adjuster_id;
SELECT * FROM Policy;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date FROM Policy WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_email FROM Adjuster ORDER BY adjuster_id DESC;
SELECT claim_description, claim_amount FROM Claim ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, claim_notes FROM ClaimHistory WHERE claim_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM Policy WHERE policy_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date FROM Policy WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, policy_start_date FROM Policy ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT claim_description, claim_amount FROM Claim WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_email FROM Adjuster WHERE adjuster_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY adjuster_name ASC;
